SELECT s.id, s.student_name, s.stu_id, s.age, c.name 'class1.name'
from student s left join class c on s.class_id = c.id where s.stu_id = #{stuId} and s.student_name = #{studentName}

SELECT s.id, s.student_name, s.stu_id, s.age, c.name 'class1.name'
from student s left join class c on s.class_id = c.id where s.id = #{id}

select c.name 'class1.name', s.student_name , ocp.one_card_pass_id 'oneCardPass.oneCardPassId' , ss.one_card 'studentStatus.oneCard' from student s left join class c on s.class_id = c.id left join one_card_pass ocp on s.stu_id = ocp.stu_id left join student_status ss on ss.student_id = s.stu_id left join grade g on g.id = c.grade_id left join major m on m.id = c.major_id left join department d on d.id = m.department_id where d.name = #{department} and m.name = #{major} and g.name= #{grade} and c.name= #{Class}
